languages.text: "{name}?" {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас с тревогой во взгляде.{/n} "Полагаю, теперь ты понимаешь, о чем я предупреждал тебя. Молю Трон, что понимаешь и то, почему я не мог рассказать тебе все".

traits.locale_text: "{name}?" {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас с тревогой во взгляде.{/n} "Полагаю, теперь ты понимаешь, о чем я предупреждал тебя. Молю Трон, что понимаешь и то, почему я не мог рассказать тебе все".

languages.text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас с тревогой во взгляде.{/n} "Полагаю, теперь ты понимаешь, о чем я предупреждал тебя. Молю Трон, что понимаешь и то, почему я не мог рассказать тебе все".

traits.locale_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."
"{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."
"{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."
"{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."

languages.text: “{name}?”{n}海因里希沮丧地看着你。{/n}“我想，你现在应该明白我之前的警告是什么意思了。我向黄金王座祈祷，希望你也能理解为什么我当时无法对你全盘托出。”
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."

traits.locale_text: “{name}?”{n}海因里希沮丧地看着你。{/n}“我想，你现在应该明白我之前的警告是什么意思了。我向黄金王座祈祷，希望你也能理解为什么我当时无法对你全盘托出。”

languages.text: «¿{name}?». {n}Heinrix te mira, consternado.{/n} «Supongo que ahora entiende de qué quería advertirle. Y ruego al Trono que sepa entender por qué no le pude contar todo lo que sabía».
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."

traits.locale_text: «¿{name}?». {n}Heinrix te mira, consternado.{/n} «Supongo que ahora entiende de qué quería advertirle. Y ruego al Trono que sepa entender por qué no le pude contar todo lo que sabía».

languages.text: 「{name}？」{n}ハインリックスは失望した目であなたを見る。{/n}「ようやく我が警告を理解したようだな。すべてを話せなかった理由も分かってもらえるよう、我は王座に祈るとしよう」
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}？」{n}ハインリックスは失望した目であなたを見る。{/n}「ようやく我が警告を理解したようだな。すべてを話せなかった理由も分かってもらえるよう、我は王座に祈るとしよう」

languages.text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix sieht dich betroffen an.{/n} "Ich nehme an, Ihr versteht nun, wovor ich Euch gewarnt habe. Ich bete zum Thron, dass Ihr auch versteht, warum ich Euch nicht alles erzählen konnte."
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."

traits.locale_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix sieht dich betroffen an.{/n} "Ich nehme an, Ihr versteht nun, wovor ich Euch gewarnt habe. Ich bete zum Thron, dass Ihr auch versteht, warum ich Euch nicht alles erzählen konnte."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde avec désarroi.{/n}« {name} ? J'imagine que vous voyez maintenant de quoi j'essayais de vous avertir. Je prie le Trône pour que vous compreniez également pourquoi je ne pouvais pas TOUT vous dire. »
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde avec désarroi.{/n}« {name} ? J'imagine que vous voyez maintenant de quoi j'essayais de vous avertir. Je prie le Trône pour que vous compreniez également pourquoi je ne pouvais pas TOUT vous dire. »

languages.text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix sana kederli bir şekilde bakıyor.{/n} "Seni ne için uyarmaya çalıştığımı artık anlıyorsun diye tahmin ediyorum. Ayrıca Taht yardımcım olsun, umarım sana neden her şeyi anlatamadığımı da anlıyorsundur."
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix looks at you in dismay.{/n} "I assume you now understand what I was warning you about. I pray to the Throne that you also understand why I was unable to tell you everything."

traits.locale_text: "{name}?" {n}Heinrix sana kederli bir şekilde bakıyor.{/n} "Seni ne için uyarmaya çalıştığımı artık anlıyorsun diye tahmin ediyorum. Ayrıca Taht yardımcım olsun, umarım sana neden her şeyi anlatamadığımı da anlıyorsundur."
